name: list categories widget
author: Peacefulqode

sections.description:
Hello
If You Want Category Sider Bar Of Woocommerce Default On Your Custom Page Using Any Page Builder But You Can’t Use That Widget Right.
But You Using Our Widget You Can Use Any Were On Your Site Our Sidebar Can Also Provide Best Category Widget Ui Interface For User.

Our Widiget Supported Themes
=> Hostingo
=> Storefront
=> Twenty Twenty-one
=> WordPress Defult Themes Support

Thank You
sections.installation:
1. Upload category-widget.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  3. The categories post will be available on widegt page (Apperance >> Widget)
    WordPress administration page.
